label: 家
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: a household or, alternatively, a patrilineage. The ritsuryô codes provided that high-rankers have household officials (keishi) to oversee their household affairs. Thus early use of the term emerged among high-ranking aristocrats. [律令] [家司]
